Package com.eemi.ext4j.client.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComponentTraversalCallback
    Component traversal callback interface.
    ContainerTraversalCallback
    Container traversal callback interface.
    DefaultsHandler
    Interface that is used by Container.setDefaults(DefaultsHandler) .
    DomQueryFunction
    Intefrace used / returned by certain com.gwtext.client.core.DomQuery methods.
    Function
    Generic interface to use as callback
    Observable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractComponent
    An abstract base class which provides shared methods for Components across the Sencha product line.
    BaseExtWidget
    Base abstract Widget class.
    Box
    This class represents an Element's Box.
    Browser
    Provides useful information about the current browser.
    Component
    Base class for all Ext components.
    ComponentManager
    Component manager.
    ComponentPosition  
    ComponentQuery
    Provides searching of Components within ComponentManager (globally) or a specific Container on the document with a similar syntax to a CSS selector.
    CompositeElement
    Standard composite class that creates an ExtElement for every element in the collection.
    CompositeElementLite
    Flyweight composite class.
    Direction
    Direction constants.
    DomConfig
    The DOM object spec.
    DomElement
    Represents a base Element in the DOM.
    DomHelper
    The DomHelper class provides a layer of abstraction from DOM and transparently supports creating elements via DOM or using HTML fragments.
    DomQuery
    Provides high performance selector/xpath processing by compiling queries into reusable functions.
    DomQuery.SelectorType  
    DomUtil
    DOM related helper methods.
    EventManager
    Registers event handlers that want to receive a normalized EventObject instead of the standard browser event and provides several useful events directly.
    EventObject
    Just as Ext.Element wraps around a native DOM node, EventObject wraps the browser's native event-object normalizing cross-browser differences, such as which mouse button is clicked, keys pressed, mechanisms to stop event-propagation along with a method to prevent default actions from taking place.
    Ext
    Ext core utilities and functions.
    Ext4jInjector
    Utility class to inject Ext4j resources.
    ExtCompositeElement
    This class encapsulates a collection of DOM elements, providing methods to filter members, or to perform collective actions upon the whole set.
    ExtElement
    Encapsulates a DOM element, adding simple DOM manipulation facilities, normalizing for browser differences.
    ExtEntryPoint
    Base class for bootstrapping an ext4j application.
    ExtEventManager
    Registers event handlers that want to receive a normalized EventObject instead of the standard browser event and provides several useful events directly.
    FastMap<V>  
    FastMap_CustomFieldSerializer  
    FastSet  
    FastSet_CustomFieldSerializer  
    Geometry
    This class represents the geometry of an element.
    InitHandler  
    Is
    Determines information about the current platform the application is running on.
    JsObject
    Base class for representing a native Javascript class.
    JsoHelper
    Core Helper class to deal with JavaScript Object
    ListenerConfig  
    Margins
    Class that represents the margins of an element.
    NameValuePair
    A generic class used a various places that represents a name / value pair.
    ObservableJso
    Config object that can listen to events
    Paddings
    Class that represents the Paddings around an element.
    Position  
    RegExp
    Creates a regular expression object for matching text according to a pattern.
    Side
    Constants for various sides.
    SimpleComponent
    Usually one doesn't need to instantiate the Ext.Component class.
    Size
    This class represents the size of an element.
    State
    The hash of state values returned from the StateProvider.
    Template
    Represents an HTML fragment template.
    WidgetComponent
    Adapter between GWT Widget's and Component's.
    XTemplate
    A template class that supports advanced functionality like: Autofilling arrays using templates and sub-templates Conditional processing with basic comparison operators Basic math function support Execute arbitrary inline code with special built-in template variables Custom member functions Many special tags and built-in operators that aren't defined as part of the API, but are supported in the templates that can be created
